text: Arau yetiya sihamte muminasakalara lagata saksata karae tetiya kaya, 'ami imana anicho'. Akau yetiya sihamte gopane ijane sijanara lagata milita haya tetiya kaya, 'tomaloke sihamtara lagata ene katha alocana karaa neki yibora allahe tomalokara ocarata unmukta karai diche; yate sihamte iyara dbaraa tomalokara pratipalakara ocarata tomalokara biraud'dhe pramana dani dharaiba? Tomaloke buji noporaa neki
